title.narrative: Action contre les violences institutionnelles l'encontre des jeunes dans les quartiers populaires de Douar Hicher et Ettadhamen

description.narrative: - youth between 18 and 34 - local associations , youth and women's groups ...etc -local authorities and public institutions (municipalities ,youth centre,schools ..etc) - The National Instance for the Prevention of Torture . - National and international organizations

The objective of this project is twofold. It aims first of all to strengthen the democratic transition in the country, through the promotion of human rights, the fight against institutional, physical and symbolic violence as well as gender violence and police violence, the use of torture and all other cruel, degrading and inhuman treatment or punishment to young adults between the ages of 18 and 34 (unemployed, high school students, precarious workers, women, football team supporters, etc.) living in poor areas of Greater Tunis. It then aims to develop an awareness for the prevention of violence, torture and ill-treatment in urban and peri-urban areas that are often difficult to access to human rights NGOs as well as fight against impunity.

The promotion of human rights, the fight against all forms of violence and the use of torture and all other cruel, degrading and inhuman treatment in young adults between the ages of 18 and 34, inhabitants the governorates of the poor districts of the great Tunis (Ettadhamen, Douar Hicher). Funded by Swiss and implement in partnership with local association, the project seeks to develop awareness of the prevention of all aspect of violence (sexual, symbolic, police violence ..etc.)in urban and peri-urban areas that are still difficult to access to human rights NGOs.
the project will involve the production of research , dialogue forums, advocacy and awareness campaigns.
